title: Household budget management on fixed retirement income
description: Household budget management on fixed retirement income
content:
Scenario: Household budget management on fixed retirement income
    Given household operates on $28k/year fixed income
    And income cannot be increased through employment
    And resources must cover housing, food, healthcare, and participation
    When Frank and his wife make household financial decisions
    Then the household_elohim should track spending against fixed budget
    And it should identify optimization opportunities without stigma
    And it should integrate financial constraints with care contribution goals
    And it should help both partners make informed trade-offs
    And budget should reflect care priorities and community participation
    And financial management should maintain dignity and agency
